item.title: How important are JEE Main Answer Keys before results to apply for NITs
item.dc:creator: Guest Article
item.description: NITs are autonomous institutes under the Central Government of India for technical and research studies. Previously, NIT was famously known as Regional Engineering College (REC). Through the NIT Act 2007, these were later recognized as Institute of National Importance (INI). There are 31 NITs across India that are listed and are among top-ranked institutes in technology. NITs take admission for their Engineering Courses through JEE Main Exam scores. NTA will release JEE Main Answer Keys tentatively by 2nd week of September after the exams are over. The JEE Main Answer Keys for January session is already released. The Answer Keys…

item.title: 5 Steps to Challenge your JEE Main Answer Keys and check latest updates
item.dc:creator: Guest Article
item.description: The class 12th results of many board examinations are already out, and with this, there is the responsibility of the students to sit for entrances and get admission into good colleges. The JEE Main is one of the fundamental examinations of the engineering aspirants to get selected to top colleges for an engineering degree. JEE Main Answer Keys for April Exam will be out tentatively after the exam which will be held between 1st – 6th September 2020. With so many uncertainties prevailing around the world due to the pandemic of Covid-19, the NTA or National Testing Agency that conducts…

item.title: Download Digital Logic and Computer Design By M. Morris Mano PDF
item.dc:creator: Srujan
item.description: Here you can download Digital Logic and Computer Design By M. Morris Mano PDF for free. This book presents the basic concepts used in the design and analysis of digital systems and introduces the principles of digital computer organization and design. It discusses various methods and techniques suitable for a variety of digital system design applications and covers all aspects of digital systems. item.title: Download Physical chemistry by Narendra Avasthi PDF
item.dc:creator: Srujan
item.description: Here you can download Physical chemistry by Narendra Avasthi PDF. This book contains the concept and problems of Physical chemistry. This book is enough for JEE main and advanced. It has 3 levels of problems, Level 1 contains problems for JEE Main and NCERT, and next two levels contains questions for JEE Advanced which includes multi correct, matrix match, paragraph, integer type (also decimal type for some). The difficulty level is also greatly matched (some times the questions are more difficult type than the questions asked in Advanced). The only con is that there are only solutions for selected problems…
